scripts.setup:clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm run setup
scripts.deploy: pnpm run deploy:web && pnpm run deploy:api && pnpm run deploy:cms
scripts.deploy:api: pnpm run build:api && cd apps/api && pnpm run deploy
scripts.deploy:web: pnpm run build:web && cd apps/web && pnpm run deploy
scripts.deploy:cms: pnpm run build:cms && cd apps/cms && pnpm run deploy
scripts.db:migrate:local: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-stg --local
scripts.db:migrate:stg: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-stg --remote --env staging
scripts.db:migrate:prod: cd apps/web && wrangler d1 migrations apply onlydonations-db-prod --remote --env production
scripts.db:setup: pnpm run db:auth:generate && pnpm run db:generate && pnpm run db:migrate:local
